name: Matriarch Serpentine Lamia
movement: climb 20 ft., swim 20 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Matriarch Serpentine Lamia has a serpentine lower body blending into a humanoid upper body, with a cunning gaze and alluring presence.
memorable: Her ability to charm and manipulate others makes her a dangerous foe in both combat and social encounters.
goals: To control and manipulate prey, using deception and charm.
relations: Might summon or communicate with serpents.
environment: Prefers dark, shadowy areas where she can ambush her targets.
strengths: High Charisma and Dexterity make her adept at charming and avoiding attacks.
weaknesses: Lower Intelligence limits strategic options and complex tactics.
attacks: Utilizes a scimitar for slashing damage, and can grapple with a restraining constricting attack.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to charm a humanoid for a day and control their actions as long as they are not harmed.
senses: Notable for her high proficiency in deception and intimidation.
skills: Excels in deception and intimidation with exceptional skill to manipulate others.
additional_information: Can communicate with serpents for intelligence or assistance.
Gains advantage on attacks against surprised or charmed foes.
Resilient to being knocked prone due to her snake body.
Inherits a magical ability to cast various spells based on Charisma.
Can use stealth effectively to ambush targets.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with spells including charm and illusion effects.
test_queries: sneaky monster that can charm humanoids
ambushing creature with magical charm abilities
deceptive large monster that loves shadows
